product_name: Patagonia Troposphere Rain Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A shell to protect from cold and wet weather while you get your outdoor fix, the men's Patagonia Troposphere Rain Jacket is waterproof and breathable with a generous dose of stretch for full mobility. 2.5-layer H2No(R) Performance Standard shell fabric is waterproof, windproof and breathable; no lining means it's lightweight and compressible for packing. Napoleon-style chest pockets with pressed pleats provide generous and convenient storage; handwarmer pockets are above the harness line for easy access. Patagonia Troposphere Rain Jacket features a regular fit. Helmet-compatible, 2-way-adjustable hood; coated, watertight pit zips; soft rip-and-stick cuffs; dual-adjust drawcord hem; trim, minimal stormflap. Closeout.
short_description: A shell to protect from cold and wet weather while you get your outdoor fix, the men's Patagonia Troposphere Rain Jacket is waterproof and breathable with a generous dose of stretch for full mobility.
